availabilityZones.description: A list of availability zones. You must specify exactly two.

multiplexSettings.description: Multiplex settings. See Multiplex Settings for more details.

name.description:
name of Multiplex.

The following arguments are optional:

startMultiplex.description: Whether to start the Multiplex. Defaults to `false`.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the Multiplex. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.
